title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     August 09, 2016  SHOOTING STAR SPECTACULAR LIGHTS UP CUMBERLAND GAP NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK  As darkness falls in the southern mountains, the historic Hensley Settlement in Cumberland Gap National Historical Park becomes the stage for a shooting star spectacular!  Its remote location high upon Brush Mountain provides an incredible opportunity to view the night sky and the famous Perseid meteor shower.   August 03, 2016  Public Review Period Now Open for New Fire Management Plan Proposed for Cumberland Gap National Historical Park  Cumberland Gap National Historical Park is in the process of updating the park fire management plan. Public review period now open.
